INTO art (artNo, artImg, artName_kr, artName_eng, artPrice, artDate, artSize, artExplain, artMain, memId ,ctgId) VALUES (#{artNo}, #{artImg}, #{artName_kr}, #{artName_eng}, #{artPrice}, #{artDate}, #{artSize}, #{artExplain}, #{artMain}, #{memId}, #{ctgId})
